definition: medicine/drug/substance used for a specific purpose (e.g. poisoning, explosion, fermenting)/CL:種|种[zhong3],服[fu4],味[wei4]/to poison

sentences.english: Traditional Chinese Medicine Committee of Diabetes.
sentences.chinese: 中國中醫藥學會消渴病專業委員會。

sentences.english: Traditional Chinese medicine has a history of thousands of years.
sentences.chinese: 中國醫藥學有着數千年的歷史。

sentences.english: Breeding drugs would be a medical boon .
sentences.chinese: 藥物繁育是醫藥學的一個恩惠。

sentences.english: I see no reason why medical research cannot go ahead.
sentences.chinese: 我堅信醫藥學研究一定會繼續向前。

sentences.english: He began to take a great interest in conventional medicine.
sentences.chinese: 他開始對保守醫藥學出現了極大的興趣。

sentences.english: China Chinese Medicine Institute of Science and Technology Award has been awarded a five.
sentences.chinese: 中華中醫藥學會科學技術獎至今已頒發了五屆。

sentences.english: Traditional Chinese medicine is the crystallization of the experience accumulated by Chinese people in fighting against diseases.
sentences.chinese: 中國醫藥學是中國人民長期同疾病作鬥爭的經驗總結。

sentences.english: The theory of traditional Chinese medicine has been deeply influenced by classical Chinese materialism and dialectics .
sentences.chinese: 中醫藥學受古代唯物論和辯證法的深刻影響。

sentences.english: Taiping Jing should be understood and illustrated from the angle of medical science.
sentences.chinese: 從醫藥學的角度入手，解讀和闡釋《太平經》。

sentences.english: Ganoderma lucidum is one of most frequently used fungi in Chinese medicine and nutrition.
sentences.chinese: 靈芝是我國醫藥學寶庫中的一種珍貴的藥食兩用菌。

sentences.english: Xiaogan Chinese medicine Pharmaceutical society Director Unit.
sentences.chinese: 孝感市中醫藥學會理事單位。

sentences.english: Other experts in psychosexual medicine are not entirely convinced though.
sentences.chinese: 其他心理醫藥學專家並不完全苟同此觀點。

sentences.english: Trditionl Chinese Medicine Committee of Dibetes.
sentences.chinese: 神州中醫藥學會消渴病專業委員會。

sentences.english: Traditional Chinese medical science stated that dreams are related to the health condition of human’s bodies.
sentences.chinese: 中醫藥學指出，夢與人體健康息息相關。

sentences.english: Traditional Chinese medicine is an important part of Chinese culture.
sentences.chinese: 中國醫藥學是我國優秀文化的一個重要組成部分。

definition: China University of Political Science and Law, Beijing, with undergraduate campus at Changping 昌平[Chang1 ping2], and graduate campus in Haidian district 海澱區|海淀区[Hai3 dian4 qu1]

definition: Joseph Needham (1900-1995), British biochemist and author of Science and Civilization in China

definition: full-time/to appoint sb to a specific task
